page.title: 04A winter's day
page.content: {Mr Holloway's jobs on the farm in {winter . { {6 00} Gets up {6 30} Milks cows: wash udders;spray disinfectant;feed suckling calves by hand. {8 30 Breakfast.} {9 00} Feeds all young stock with cake or sillage.Cleans cubicles.Gets cows out. {11 00}Checks stock for illness.Debuds horns with hot irons.{ {13 00 Lunch. {14 00}Maintenance jobs:_check fences,gates and ditches. Load corn for drilling. Spray weedkiller. {17 00 Tea. Some jobs,like calving take place at any time of the day or night.
